channel.title: Working teleports
channel.description:
ok as the title says, i want to get "working teleports"
i was jsut wondering if anyone has the codes to make the teleports work it will be greatly appreciated if you can post them (btw im using a figment v4 base)
~~slevins~~

item.title: Working teleports
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

[quote=“slevins, post:3, topic:227554”]the normal ones and ancients, i like want the normal ones to be the usual (to varrock, lumby, etc.)
& the ancients to be to my custom places. all i know is i gotta add a heap of stuff to the client.java[/quote]
[size=10pt]
Ancients[/size]

In packet 185 (Clicking most buttons),

case 185:

Add in the following packets for the ancient teleports.


case 50235:           //First Teleport
//Just put teleport function here
break;

case 50245:           //Second teleport
//Just put teleport function here
break;

case 50253:          //third teleport
//Just put teleport function here
break;

case 51005:          //fourth teleport
//Just put teleport function here
break;

case 51013:                //fifth teleport
//Just put teleport function here
break;

case 51023:                  //sixth teleport
//Just put teleport function here
break;

case 51031:              // seventh teleport
//Just put teleport function here
break;

case 51039:                // eighth teleport
//Just put teleport function here
break;

Those are all 8 ancient teleports.
Remember to add them into packet 185. Nowhere else.

Read full topic
